title: Lando Norris takes one step closer to becoming F1's modern racing tycoon
summary: As he fights for the F1 title, Lando Norris cements his influence off track with the sale of Quadrant to esports powerhouse Veloce

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is currently fighting for the F1 title and has expanded his business influence off the track?
What company did Lando Norris sell to strengthen his business interests in esports?
Which esports organization acquired Lando Norris's Quadrant?
